title: Cursed Pirate Lagoon Adventure #102
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Cursed Pirate Cove
rooms.description: A misty cove shrouded in an eerie green fog. The skeletal remains of a pirate camp litter the rocky shore. Ghostly whispers echo across the water, and the air smells of brine and decay. A weathered wooden sign warns of a terrible curse. Moonlight reflects off the dark waves.

items.name: weathered warning sign
items.description: A rotting wooden sign with carved letters
items.text: BEWARE! Captain Redbeard's curse claims all who seek his treasure. Only those who know his story may pass. He died in the year 1692, taking his secrets to a watery grave.

items.name: old supply barrel
items.description: A barnacle-covered barrel that once held provisions

items.name: rusty cutlass
items.description: A corroded pirate sword, still sharp enough to cut through rope

items.name: locked pirate chest
items.description: A small chest bound with heavy rope and secured with a combination lock

items.name: tarnished brass key
items.description: A brass key with a skull emblem, green with age

items.name: Captain's sealed letter
items.description: A letter sealed with red wax bearing Redbeard's mark
items.text: To whoever finds this: I am Captain Redbeard, and I have hidden my greatest treasure in the grotto beyond the ship graveyard. My first mate was Bones McGraw. My ship was the Crimson Revenge. The treasure lies in Skull Rock Grotto. Beware the curse!

items.name: cold campfire
items.description: The remains of an old campfire with charred wood

items.name: burned map fragment
items.description: A partially burned piece of parchment showing part of a map
items.text: The map shows a path from the cove through the ship graveyard to a hidden grotto. A note reads: 'The grotto gate opens only to those who prove they know Redbeard's tale.'

items.name: thick rope barrier
items.description: Heavy ropes blocking the path to the ship graveyard, covered in seaweed

rooms.name: Haunted Ship Graveyard
rooms.description: A nightmarish scene of wrecked ships jutting from the shallow waters. Broken masts reach toward the sky like skeletal fingers. Ghostly lights flicker in the fog. The hulls of three ships are visible: the Crimson Revenge, the Sea Serpent, and the Black Pearl. A cave entrance glows with an unnatural light to the east.

items.name: hull of the Crimson Revenge
items.description: The remains of Captain Redbeard's flagship, listing heavily to one side
items.text: The nameplate reads: 'Crimson Revenge - Captained by the infamous Redbeard. First Mate: Bones McGraw. Lost to the curse in 1692.'

items.name: wreck of the Sea Serpent
items.description: A merchant vessel that met its doom in these waters

items.name: waterlogged ship's log
items.description: A journal from the Sea Serpent's captain
items.text: Final entry: We encountered the ghost ship Crimson Revenge. Captain Redbeard's spirit guards his treasure in Skull Rock Grotto. They say only gold can break a pirate's curse. We tried to flee but the curse took us too.

items.name: cabin of the Black Pearl
items.description: A partially intact captain's cabin with a locked strongbox

items.name: old navigation charts
items.description: Sea charts marking the location of Skull Rock Grotto
items.text: These charts show the exact location of Skull Rock Grotto, marked with a skull symbol. A note reads: 'Redbeard's first mate Bones McGraw knew the way. The treasure can only be claimed by breaking the curse with gold.'

items.name: cursed silver medallion
items.description: A tarnished silver medallion that pulses with dark energy

items.name: floating debris pile
items.description: A collection of broken planks and barrels floating in the water

items.name: Spanish gold doubloon
items.description: A gleaming gold coin that radiates warmth and seems to repel the curse

items.name: glowing cave entrance
items.description: A cave entrance carved into the cliff face, emanating an eerie green glow. Ancient symbols are carved around the opening, and three questions are etched into a stone tablet.

password_questions.question: What was the name of Redbeard's ship?
password_questions.hint: Check the hull of Redbeard's flagship in the graveyard

password_questions.question: Who was Redbeard's first mate?
password_questions.hint: The captain's letter mentions this name

password_questions.question: Where does the treasure lie?
password_questions.hint: Multiple sources mention the treasure's location

rooms.name: Skull Rock Grotto
rooms.description: You have found Captain Redbeard's legendary treasure chamber! The cavern is filled with piles of gold coins, jeweled goblets, and precious artifacts. In the center, on a stone altar, sits an ornate chest overflowing with treasure. The ghostly figure of Captain Redbeard appears, his spectral form watching you. A shimmering portal of light offers escape from the cursed lagoon.

items.name: stone treasure altar
items.description: An ancient altar holding Redbeard's greatest treasures
items.text: Inscription: 'To break the curse and claim the treasure, place the cursed silver and blessed gold together. Only then may you escape with your prize.'

items.name: pirate treasure hoard
items.description: Mountains of gold coins, jewels, and precious artifacts

items.name: ruby necklace
items.description: A stunning necklace with blood-red rubies

items.name: emerald ring
items.description: A golden ring set with a large emerald

items.name: ghost of Captain Redbeard
items.description: The spectral form of the legendary pirate captain
items.text: The ghost speaks: 'You have proven yourself worthy by knowing my story. Take the treasure, but remember - only by combining the cursed silver with blessed gold can you break my curse and escape this place.'

items.name: shimmering escape portal
items.description: A magical portal that leads away from the cursed lagoon. It requires both the cursed medallion and the gold doubloon to activate fully.

rooms.name: Safe Harbor
rooms.description: You emerge on a peaceful beach bathed in warm sunlight. The curse is broken! Captain Redbeard's ghost appears one final time, nodding gratefully before fading into the morning light. A merchant ship waits at anchor, ready to take you and your treasure to safety.

items.name: friendly merchant ship
items.description: A sturdy vessel with a crew ready to help you

items.name: chest of treasure
items.description: The treasure you claimed from Redbeard's grotto, now safely yours

rooms.win_message: You have broken Captain Redbeard's curse and escaped the haunted lagoon with his legendary treasure! The cursed silver medallion crumbles to dust as the golden doubloon glows brightly. Redbeard's spirit is finally at peace, and you sail away a wealthy adventurer with an incredible tale of the Cursed Pirate Lagoon. You win!
